name: Classic Stone Creek Stone Ground Cover - 0.5 cu. ft. Bag
description: Classic Stone 0.5 cu. ft. Creek Stone is a great ground cover solution for enhancing the appearance of your landscape. This decorative landscape stone will help retain moisture in soil and help prevent erosion. Creek Stone is ideal for use around trees, shrubs and water features.Easy installationControls erosion to help protect your landscape0.5 cu. ft. bag covers approximately 3 sq. ft. when spread 2 in. thickAll online orders for this item may arrive in multiple packages
